name: Gluten-Free Tortilla 'Crackers'
description: Corn tortilla bake up into quick 'crackers.' The chili powder and cumin are just suggestions. Season them with seasonings you like....
recipeIngredient: 10 6-inch gluten-free corn tortillas, at room temperature
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust oven racks to the upper and lower middle positions and preheat oven to 400°F. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, cumin, and chili powder. Using a pastry brush, lightly brush each tortilla on both sides with the oil. Using a chef’s knife or pizza wheel, cut each tortilla into strips about 1 inch thick. Cut strips into 1-inch pieces
Divide the crackers between two baking sheets. Bake for 5 minutes. Remove the pan from the oven. Using a spatula, gently turn over the strips. Return to the oven and bake until crisp, about 3 more.
Remove from the oven and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Cool and store in an air-tight container for about one week.
